taskbody.context: This task is about creating a new jBPM project and adding a BPMN process to it.

step.cmd: Switch to jBPM perspective in Design studio to design graphical process descriptions
To create a new jBPM project, Select File → New → Project from the menu in Design Studio workbench.
Enter a name for the project in the Project name: text box and click Next.
Select an empty project in the New jBPM project window.
Add the jBPM runtime, if not already added using window->preferences.

step.stepresult: A new jBPM project is added to the Project Explorer pane.

step.cmd: To create a BMPN process, Select File → New → Other and then select jBPM → BPMN2 Process.
Select the parent folder. You may add the process directly to the Project created in the previous step or to the src/main/resources folder inside the Project.
Enter a file name for the business process and click on finish.

taskbody.result: A <filename>.bpmn file is created and added to the folder.
taskbody.postreq: Refer to the JBoss BRMS 5.3 Getting Started guide on the JBoss BRMS site for more information.
